May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame **Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 79 **Price** 12 gp --- This simple trap is made of taut twigs that, when triggered, snap down on a pollen-filled sac of a peculiar flower. When inhaled, the pollen imparts a hazy state of profound agreeability. The first creature that enters the snare's space triggers the snare. The creature that triggered the trap must attempt a DC 18 Will save. [Undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creatures and creatures that don't breathe are immune to dream pollen. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 round.
**Failure** The creature is stupefied 1 for 1 round. For 1 minute, the creature becomes [friendly](/Conditions.aspx?ID=18) to all creatures to which it was [indifferent](/Conditions.aspx?ID=25), or [helpful](/Conditions.aspx?ID=21) to all creatures to which it was friendly. If the creature was [unfriendly](/Conditions.aspx?ID=40) or [hostile](/Conditions.aspx?ID=23) to any creatures, it remains unfriendly or hostile to them. If the creature is an [animal](/Traits.aspx?ID=9), any creature to which it's friendly or helpful can use [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on it and to make very simple [Requests](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) of it.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the duration of the agreeability is 1 hour instead of 1 minute.
name: Dream Pollen Snare
